statements.select: select DICTCUSTOMERID from dictcustomer c where c.Active ='1' and c.dictcustomerid=$value$

SELECT DICTCUSTOMERID AS Dictcustomerid,CUSTOMERCODE AS Customercode,FASTCODE AS Fastcode,CUSTOMERNAME AS Customername,CUSTOMERENGNAME AS Customerengname, ENGADDRESS AS Engaddress,DISPLAYORDER AS Displayorder,ADDRESS AS Address,TELEPHONE AS Telephone,FAX AS Fax,POSTCODE AS Postcode,CONTACTMAN AS Contactman, CONTACTPHONE AS Contactphone,EMAIL AS Email,ACTIVE AS Active,REMARK AS Remark,STATUS AS Status,ERPCODE AS Erpcode,ERPNAME AS Erpname, DOCUMENTTYPE AS Documenttype,DOCUMENTCODE AS Documentcode,DICTSALEMANID AS Dictsalemanid,DICTCHECKBILLID AS Dictcheckbillid,LASTUPDATEDATE AS Lastupdatedate, DICTLABID AS Dictlabid,CUSTOMERTYPE AS Customertype,REPORTTITLE AS Reporttitle,ISSMS AS Issms,CUSTOMERNAME2 AS Customername2,ISPUBLIC as IsPublic, YGSYNCSTATUS as YGSyncStatus,DZSYNCSTATUS as DZSyncStatus FROM Dictcustomer where Active ='1'
Dictcustomerid like '%'||#value#||'%' or Customername like '%'||#value#||'%' or Customerengname like '%'||#value#||'%'

SELECT DICTCUSTOMERID AS Dictcustomerid,CUSTOMERCODE AS Customercode,FASTCODE AS Fastcode,CUSTOMERNAME AS Customername,CUSTOMERENGNAME AS Customerengname, ENGADDRESS AS Engaddress,DISPLAYORDER AS Displayorder,ADDRESS AS Address,TELEPHONE AS Telephone,FAX AS Fax,POSTCODE AS Postcode,CONTACTMAN AS Contactman, CONTACTPHONE AS Contactphone,EMAIL AS Email,ACTIVE AS Active,REMARK AS Remark,STATUS AS Status,ERPCODE AS Erpcode,ERPNAME AS Erpname, DOCUMENTTYPE AS Documenttype,DOCUMENTCODE AS Documentcode,DICTSALEMANID AS Dictsalemanid,DICTCHECKBILLID AS Dictcheckbillid,LASTUPDATEDATE AS Lastupdatedate, DICTLABID AS Dictlabid,CUSTOMERTYPE AS Customertype,REPORTTITLE AS Reporttitle,ISSMS AS Issms,CUSTOMERNAME2 AS Customername2,ISPUBLIC as IsPublic, YGSYNCSTATUS as YGSyncStatus,DZSYNCSTATUS as DZSyncStatus FROM Dictcustomer where Active ='1'
(Active ='1' and Dictlabid in ($value$) and Customertype='0') or (Active ='1' and IsPublic='1')

SELECT DICTCUSTOMERID AS Dictcustomerid,CUSTOMERCODE AS Customercode,FASTCODE AS Fastcode,CUSTOMERNAME AS Customername,CUSTOMERENGNAME AS Customerengname, ENGADDRESS AS Engaddress,DISPLAYORDER AS Displayorder,ADDRESS AS Address,TELEPHONE AS Telephone,FAX AS Fax,POSTCODE AS Postcode,CONTACTMAN AS Contactman, CONTACTPHONE AS Contactphone,EMAIL AS Email,ACTIVE AS Active,REMARK AS Remark,STATUS AS Status,ERPCODE AS Erpcode,ERPNAME AS Erpname, DOCUMENTTYPE AS Documenttype,DOCUMENTCODE AS Documentcode,DICTSALEMANID AS Dictsalemanid,DICTCHECKBILLID AS Dictcheckbillid,LASTUPDATEDATE AS Lastupdatedate, DICTLABID AS Dictlabid,CUSTOMERTYPE AS Customertype,REPORTTITLE AS Reporttitle,ISSMS AS Issms,CUSTOMERNAME2 AS Customername2,ISPUBLIC as IsPublic,YGSYNCSTATUS as YGSyncStatus,DZSYNCSTATUS as DZSyncStatus FROM Dictcustomer where (Customercode = #value# or Customername = #Customername#) and Dictcustomerid != #Dictcustomerid#

SELECT DICTCUSTOMERID AS Dictcustomerid,CUSTOMERCODE AS Customercode,FASTCODE AS Fastcode,CUSTOMERNAME AS Customername,CUSTOMERENGNAME AS Customerengname, ENGADDRESS AS Engaddress,DISPLAYORDER AS Displayorder,ADDRESS AS Address,TELEPHONE AS Telephone,FAX AS Fax,POSTCODE AS Postcode,CONTACTMAN AS Contactman, CONTACTPHONE AS Contactphone,EMAIL AS Email,ACTIVE AS Active,REMARK AS Remark,STATUS AS Status,ERPCODE AS Erpcode,ERPNAME AS Erpname, DOCUMENTTYPE AS Documenttype,DOCUMENTCODE AS Documentcode,DICTSALEMANID AS Dictsalemanid,DICTCHECKBILLID AS Dictcheckbillid,LASTUPDATEDATE AS Lastupdatedate, DICTLABID AS Dictlabid,CUSTOMERTYPE AS Customertype,REPORTTITLE AS Reporttitle,ISSMS AS Issms,CUSTOMERNAME2 AS Customername2,ISPUBLIC as IsPublic,YGSYNCSTATUS as YGSyncStatus,DZSYNCSTATUS as DZSyncStatus FROM Dictcustomer where Active ='1'
CUSTOMERTYPE=#value#

SELECT DICTCUSTOMERID AS Dictcustomerid,CUSTOMERCODE AS Customercode,FASTCODE AS Fastcode,CUSTOMERNAME AS Customername,CUSTOMERENGNAME AS Customerengname, ENGADDRESS AS Engaddress,DISPLAYORDER AS Displayorder,ADDRESS AS Address,TELEPHONE AS Telephone,FAX AS Fax,POSTCODE AS Postcode,CONTACTMAN AS Contactman, CONTACTPHONE AS Contactphone,EMAIL AS Email,ACTIVE AS Active,REMARK AS Remark,STATUS AS Status,ERPCODE AS Erpcode,ERPNAME AS Erpname, DOCUMENTTYPE AS Documenttype,DOCUMENTCODE AS Documentcode,DICTSALEMANID AS Dictsalemanid,DICTCHECKBILLID AS Dictcheckbillid,LASTUPDATEDATE AS Lastupdatedate, DICTLABID AS Dictlabid,CUSTOMERTYPE AS Customertype,REPORTTITLE AS Reporttitle,ISSMS AS Issms,CUSTOMERNAME2 AS Customername2,ISPUBLIC as IsPublic,YGSYNCSTATUS as YGSyncStatus,DZSYNCSTATUS as DZSyncStatus FROM Dictcustomer where Active ='1'
CUSTOMERTYPE='$value$'
DICTLABID in (select DICTLABID from dictlab t where t.dictlabid='$dictlabId$' )

SELECT Dictcustomerid,Customercode,Fastcode,Customername,Customerengname,Engaddress,Displayorder,Address,Telephone,Fax,Postcode,Contactman,Contactphone,Email, Active,Remark,Status,Erpcode,Erpname,Documenttype,Documentcode, Dictsalemanid,Dictcheckbillid,Lastupdatedate,Dictlabid, Customertype,Reporttitle,Issms,Customername2,IsPublic,YGSyncStatus,DZSyncStatus FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, t.* FROM (SELECT Dictcustomerid,Customercode,Fastcode,Customername,Customerengname,Engaddress,Displayorder,Address,Telephone,Fax,Postcode,Contactman,Contactphone,Email, Active,Remark,Status,Erpcode,Erpname,Documenttype,Documentcode, Dictsalemanid,Dictcheckbillid,Lastupdatedate,Dictlabid, Customertype,Reporttitle,Issms,Customername2,IsPublic,YGSyncStatus,DZSyncStatus FROM Dictcustomer where 1=1
(Customercode like '%$strKey$%' or Customername like '%$strKey$%' or Customerengname like '%$strKey$%')
Active = '$IsActive$'
Dictlabid = $Dictlabid$
order by Dictcustomerid desc ,Displayorder desc) t WHERE ROWNUM <=$pageEnd$ ) WHERE RN >= $pageStart$

SELECT Count(*) FROM Dictcustomer where 1=1
(Customercode like '%$strKey$%' or Customername like '%$strKey$%' or Customerengname like '%$strKey$%')
Active = '$IsActive$'
Dictlabid = $Dictlabid$

select * from( select rownum as rn,t.* from( SELECT c.Dictcustomerid,c.Customercode,c.Fastcode,c.Customername,c.Customerengname,c.Engaddress,c.Displayorder,c.Address,c.Telephone,c.Fax,c.Postcode,c.Contactman,c.Contactphone, c.Email, c.Active,c.Remark,c.Status,c.Erpcode,c.Erpname,c.Documenttype,c.Documentcode,c. Dictsalemanid,c.Dictcheckbillid,c.Lastupdatedate,c.Dictlabid, c.Customertype,c.Reporttitle, c.Issms,c.Customername2,c.IsPublic,user1.username saleman,user2.username checkbillnam,decode(c.active,'0','未审核','1','已审核') audittext,l.labname from dictcustomer c ,dictuser user1,dictuser user2,dictlab l where c.dictsalemanid=user1.dictuserid and c.dictcheckbillid=user2.dictuserid and c.dictlabid=l.dictlabid
(c.Customercode like '%$strKey$%' or c.Customername like '%$strKey$%' or c.Customerengname like '%$strKey$%')
c.Active = '$IsActive$'
(c.Dictlabid = $Dictlabid$ or c.IsPublic='1')
order by c.dictcustomerid desc,c.displayorder desc )t where rownum <= $pageEnd$ )tt where tt.rn>=$pageStart$

SELECT Count(1) FROM Dictcustomer where 1=1
(Customercode like '%$strKey$%' or Customername like '%$strKey$%' or Customerengname like '%$strKey$%')
Active = '$IsActive$'
(Dictlabid = $Dictlabid$ or IsPublic='1')

SELECT c.Dictcustomerid,c.Customercode,c.Fastcode,c.Customername,c.Customerengname,c.Engaddress,c.Displayorder,c.Address,c.Telephone,c.Fax,c.Postcode,c.Contactman,c.Contactphone, c.Email, c.Active,c.Remark,c.Status,c.Erpcode,c.Erpname,c.Documenttype,c.Documentcode,c. Dictsalemanid,c.Dictcheckbillid,c.Lastupdatedate,c.Dictlabid, c.Customertype,c.Reporttitle, c.Issms,c.Customername2,c.IsPublic,user1.username saleman,user2.username checkbillnam,decode(c.active,'0','未审核','1','已审核') audittext,l.labname from dictcustomer c ,dictuser user1,dictuser user2,dictlab l where c.dictsalemanid=user1.dictuserid and c.dictcheckbillid=user2.dictuserid and c.dictlabid=l.dictlabid
(c.Customercode like '%$strKey$%' or c.Customername like '%$strKey$%' or c.Customerengname like '%$strKey$%')
c.Active = '$IsActive$'
(c.Dictlabid = $Dictlabid$ or c.IsPublic='1')
order by c.dictcustomerid desc,c.displayorder desc

SELECT Dictcustomerid,Customercode,Fastcode,Customername,Customerengname,Engaddress,Displayorder,Address,Telephone,Fax,Postcode,Contactman,Contactphone, Email, Active,Remark,Status,Erpcode,Erpname,Documenttype,Documentcode, Dictsalemanid,Dictcheckbillid,Lastupdatedate,Dictlabid, Customertype,Reporttitle, Issms,Customername2,IsPublic,YGSyncStatus,DZSyncStatus FROM Dictcustomer where Dictcustomerid=#value#

select dictcustomerid,c.customercode,c.customername,c.address,c.telephone,c.contactman from Dictcustomer c where Active ='1'
(YGSyncStatus='0' or YGSyncStatus='2' or YGSyncStatus is null)
(DZSyncStatus='0' or DZSyncStatus='2' or DZSyncStatus is null)
statements.update:
UPDATE Dictcustomer SET
YGSyncStatus=#status#
DZSyncStatus=#status#
where Dictcustomerid in ($dictcustomerid$)
statements.delete: DELETE FROM Dictcustomer WHERE Dictcustomerid in($value$)
statements.update: update Dictcustomer set Active=#active#,Lastupdatedate=#lastupdatetime# where Dictcustomerid in ($dictcustomerid$)
